Articles.Content: AVG Hunter here. Love the game. Love designing and testing even more. Anyone interested in making a small team to build together? I am very good in Maya and photoshop. could be more skilled in Unity.
To build? Like collaborative craft designs? I could go for that. I can design the tiny probes.

Considering avghunter listed Maya/Photoshop/Unity, I think that he/she meant mod creating. I could be wrong.

Welcome to the forum!
